content: अवसादः {@--1@} Sinking, fainting, sitting down; <ls>Ki. 18. 47</ls>; अनवसादः safety, protection; failure, as of the voice. {@--2@} Ruin, loss, destruction, decline; पर्यायजयावसादा <ls>Ki. 17. 18</ls>; विपदेति तावदवसादकरी <ls>Ki. 18. 23</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">6. 41</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">3. 38</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2.</ls> {@--3@} End, termination. {@--4@} Want of energy, exhaustion, languor, fatigue; किमिवावसादकरमात्मवतां <ls>Ki. 6. 19.</ls> {@--5@} (In law) Badness of a cause, defeat, losing (a cause); अलं स्वपक्षावसादशंकया <ls>M. 1.</ls>
